verbs.description: [ARG0: jcps board] votes to [V: give] up [ARG1: 15 m head start grant jcps] was recently notified by the office of head start that a single incident could jeopardize its grant status on march 27 the school board approved an application to refund its grant for 15 7 mil jefferson county mississippi office of head jefferson county public schools kentucky united states department of health and human services pollio sammy jones joint center for political and economic studies louisville kentucky kevin wheatley wdrb news
